PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-17492012-12-13,  ,  ,  ,  ,  DFAIT
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
Subject** ANTI-DOPING CONVENTION ** Amendments to Annex I of the International Convention against Doping in Sport
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to accept, on behalf of the Government of Canada, the amendments to Annex I of the INTERNATIONAL CONVENTION AGAINST DOPING IN SPORT in order to update the Prohibited List - International Standard under Annex I of the Convention.
AttachmentsAttachment
